name: Nexle Corporation
tag_list: vietnam-software-outsourcing, offshore-development, dedicated-team, odc, software-development, custom-application-development, web-application-development, mobile-application-development, iphone-development, ipad-development, ios-development, android-deve
overview:
Nexle is a start-up software company in Vietnam, focused on web & mobile application development, cloud computing, and software testing. The company builds on its solid experience with new knowledge it acquires in such industries as mobile commerce, banking software optimization, development and integration of web application as well as complex web back-end and mobile applications. We have an in-depth expertise to effectively build custom software solutions for your specific business needs by having years of experience, learning from every project and customer.

With more than 15 years active in providing offshore development services, we assist our clients to design, develop, integrate and maintain custom Web and Mobile applications and advise on technology issues.

Services offering:

  • Mobile development
  • iOS, Android, and Windows Phone application development
  • In-app purchase and push notification
  • Cross platform framework: PhoneGap, SenchaTouch, Titanium
  • Social networks and existing system integration
  • Graphics & animation, OpenGL, 2D games

  • Location based GPS, Google Map

  • Web development

  • Ruby on Rails, Microsoft .NET, Java EE, and LAMP development
  • Asp.net MVC, Orchard CMS, Jquery, Spring framework, Drupal, CakePHP, Wordpress
    • Payment gateway integration
  • Recurring billing subscription

  • Facebook application development

  • Cloud computing development

  • Software as a Service (SaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS)

  • Windows Azure, Amazone web service, Google AppEngine, JBoss OpenShift

  • Software testing

  • Telecom product verification
  • E-commerce product verification
  • Mobile application (iOS, Android) verification
  • Data driven automation test, Quick Test pro, Selenium, Test Complete, and WaTir

Our skills

  • Object C, JSON, XML, SQLite, OpenGL, Flurry iOS Analytics, PhoneGap, SenchaTouch, Titanium
    • ASP.NET MVC, C#, Silverlight, Orchard CMS, Razor, SQL Server, Microsoft SharePoint
    • Ruby on Rails, Facebook API
  • Java EE, Spring framework, Hibernate, GWT, JQuery, Vaadin, Wicket, JSF 2.1, Primefaces 3.0, JPA 2.0, EJB 3.1
    • Ajax, JQuery, Javascript, PHP5, Facebook API, Drupal CMS, SugarCRM, CakePHP, Wordpress, MySQL, PostgreSQL

Why Nexle?

We create added value for your business:

  • Competitive cost but high quality service
  • Shorten time to market
  • Solve your business challenges and help you grow with our experienced and skilled workforce
    • Approach to building long term relationship for offshore software development services
